<meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=<%charset%>" />
<!-- meta information for search engines --> <meta name="generator" content="<%version%>" /> <meta name="name" content="<%blogsetting(name)%>" /> <meta name="description" content="<%blogsetting(desc)%>" />
<!-- site stylesheet (site colors and layout definitionsï¼šLeft sidebar) --> <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="<%skinfile(default_left.css)%>" title="left bar" />
<!-- site stylesheet ADDED (some adjustment) -->
<!-- RSS 2.0 feed --> <link rel="alternate" type="application/rss+xml" title="RSS" href="<%sitevar(url)%>xml-rss2.php" />
<!-- favorite icon --> <link rel="shortcut icon" href="<%skinfile(favicon.ico)%>" /> <link rel="icon" href="<%skinfile(favicon.ico)%>" />

<!-- navigation & page titles --> <%if(skintype,index)%> <!-- index: page title and extra navigational links --> <title><%blogsetting(name)%></title> <link rel="bookmark" title="Nucleus" href="http://japan.nucleuscms.org/" /> <link rel="archives" title="Archives" href="<%archivelink%>" /> <link rel="top" title="Today" href="<%todaylink%>" />
<%elseif(skintype,item)%> <!-- item: page title and extra navigational links --> <title><%itemtitle(attribute)%> » <%blogsetting(name)%></title> <link rel="archives" title="Archives" href="<%archivelink%>" /> <link rel="top" title="Today's entry" href="<%sitevar(url)%>" /> <link rel="next" href="<%nextlink%>" title="Next item" /> <link rel="prev" href="<%prevlink%>" title="Previous item" /> <link rel="up" href="<%todaylink%>" title="Today" /> <meta name="robots" content="all,noodp,noydir" />
<%elseif(skintype,archive)%> <!-- archive: page title and extra navigational links --> <title><%blogsetting(name)%> » Archives</title> <link rel="archives" title="Archives" href="<%archivelink%>" /> <link rel="top" title="Today" href="<%sitevar(url)%>" /> <link rel="up" href="<%todaylink%>" title="Today" /> <meta name="robots" content="all,noodp,noydir,NOINDEX,NOFOLLOW" />
<%elseif(skintype,archivelist)%> <!-- archivelist: page title and extra navigational links --> <title><%blogsetting(name)%> » Archives link</title> <link rel="archives" title="Archives" href="<%archivelink%>" /> <link rel="top" title="Today" href="<%sitevar(url)%>" /> <link rel="up" href="<%todaylink%>" title="Today" /> <meta name="robots" content="all,noodp,noydir,NOINDEX,NOFOLLOW" />
<%elseif(skintype,error)%> <!-- error: page title and extra navigational links --> <title><%sitevar(name)%> » Error!</title> <link rel="top" title="Today" href="<%todaylink%>" /> <link rel="up" href="<%todaylink%>" title="Today" /> <meta name="robots" content="all,noodp,noydir,NOINDEX,NOFOLLOW" />
<%elseif(skintype,member)%> <!-- member: page title and extra navigational links --> <title><%blogsetting(name)%> » member info</title> <link rel="top" title="Today" href="<%todaylink%>" /> <link rel="up" href="<%todaylink%>" title="Today" /> <meta name="robots" content="all,noodp,noydir,NOINDEX,NOFOLLOW" />
<%elseif(skintype,search)%> <!-- search: page title and extra navigational links --> <title><%blogsetting(name)%> » search</title> <link rel="archives" title="Archives" href="<%archivelink%>" /> <link rel="top" title="Today" href="<%sitevar(url)%>" /> <link rel="up" href="<%todaylink%>" title="Today" /> <%endif%>
<%if(loggedin)%> <script type="text/javascript" src="<%adminurl%>javascript/edit.js"></script> <%endif%>
